Class ResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • intellimate.izou.resource.ResourceManager

  • public class ResourceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    this class manages all the ResourceBuilders.

      • generateResources

        public java.util.List<Resource> generateResources(Event event)
        generates all the resources for an event
        Parameters:
        event - the Event to generate the resources for
        Returns:
        a List containing all the generated resources

      • generateResources

        public java.util.List<Resource> generateResources(java.util.List<Resource> requestResources)
        generates the resources for a list of predefined Resources. This method uses all the information stored in the Resources instances to build them.
        Parameters:
        requestResources - a list containing resources instances.
        Returns:
        a List containing all the generated resources

      • generatedResource

        @Deprecated
public void generatedResource(Resource resource,
                                          java.util.function.Consumer<java.util.List<Resource>> consumer)
        Deprecated. 
        generates a resources

        It will use the first matching resource! So if you really want to be sure, set the provider Identification

        Parameters:
        resource - the resource to request
        consumer - the callback when the ResourceBuilder finishes

      • generateResource

        public java.util.Optional<java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.List<Resource>>> generateResource(Resource resource)
        generates a resources

        It will use the first matching resource! So if you really want to be sure, set the provider Identification

        Parameters:
        resource - the resource to request
        Returns:
        an optional of an CompletableFuture

      • timeOut

        public java.util.List<java.util.concurrent.Future<java.util.List<Resource>>> timeOut(java.util.List<java.util.concurrent.Future<java.util.List<Resource>>> futures)
        creates a 1 sec. timeout for the resource-generation
        Parameters:
        futures - a List of futures running
        Returns:
        list with all elements removed, who aren't finished after 1 sec

      • registerResourceBuilder

        public void registerResourceBuilder(ResourceBuilder resourceBuilder)
        registers a ResourceBuilder.

        this method registers all the events, resourcesID etc.

        Parameters:
        resourceBuilder - an instance of the ResourceBuilder

        unregister a ResourceBuilder.
